scripts.test:regression:gherkin:chrome-only: npx bddgen && cross-env BLOB_REPORT_NAME=regression-gherkin-only-chrome PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_OPEN=never npx playwright test features/regression --retries=2 --workers=3 --grep-invert @all-browsers --grep-invert @desktop-only --grep-invert @mobile-only --project=chrome
scripts.test:regression:gherkin:all: npx bddgen && cross-env BLOB_REPORT_NAME=regression-gherkin-all PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_OPEN=never npx playwright test features/regression --retries=2 --workers=3 --grep @all-browsers
scripts.test:regression:gherkin:desktop-only: npx bddgen && cross-env BLOB_REPORT_NAME=regression-gherkin-desktop-only PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_OPEN=never npx playwright test features/regression --retries=2 --workers=3 --grep @desktop-only --project=chrome --project=firefox
scripts.test:regression:gherkin:mobile-only: npx bddgen && cross-env BLOB_REPORT_NAME=regression-gherkin-mobile-only PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_OPEN=never npx playwright test features/regression --retries=2 --workers=3 --grep @mobile-only --project=galaxy --project=ipad --project=iphone
scripts.test:regression:scripts:chrome-only: cross-env BLOB_REPORT_NAME=regression-scripts-chrome-only PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_OPEN=never npx playwright test -c playwright-native.config.ts tests/regression --retries=2 --workers=3 --grep-invert @all-browsers --grep-invert @desktop-only --grep-invert @mobile-only --project=chrome
scripts.test:regression:scripts:all: cross-env BLOB_REPORT_NAME=regression-scripts-all PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_OPEN=never npx playwright test -c playwright-native.config.ts tests/regression --retries=2 --workers=3 --grep @all-browsers
scripts.test:regression:scripts:desktop-only: cross-env BLOB_REPORT_NAME=regression-scripts-desktop-only PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_OPEN=never npx playwright test -c playwright-native.config.ts tests/regression --retries=2 --workers=3  --grep @desktop-only --project=chrome --project=firefox
scripts.test:regression:scripts:mobile-only: cross-env BLOB_REPORT_NAME=regression-scripts-mobile-only PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_OPEN=never npx playwright test -c playwright-native.config.ts tests/regression --retries=2 --workers=3 --grep @mobile-only --project=galaxy --project=ipad --project=iphone
scripts.test: run-s -c clear:reports:blob test:regression:gherkin:chrome-only test:regression:gherkin:all test:regression:gherkin:desktop-only test:regression:gherkin:mobile-only test:regression:scripts:chrome-only test:regression:scripts:all test:regression:scripts:desktop-only test:regression:scripts:mobile-only report:merge
scripts.postinstall-browserstack: npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright install && cd support/test-app-ui && npm install && cd - && cd support/test-app-api && npm install && cd - && npx husky init
scripts.test-browserstack: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_OPEN=never npx bddgen && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test
scripts.test:ui-browserstack: npx bddgen && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --ui
scripts.test:debug-browserstack: npx bddgen && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --debug
scripts.smoke: cross-env-shell TEST_ENV=qa 'npx bddgen && npx playwright test features/smoke.feature --project=chrome --headed'
scripts.smoke2: cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx bddgen && npx playwright test features/smoke.feature --project=chrome
